## Functions

### canModifyToInlineImmOp32() {#aee60884f5ed993caf8f347c1497062f5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static unsigned canModifyToInlineImmOp32 (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo">SIInstrInfo</a> &#42; TII, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; Src, int32&#95;t &amp; ModifiedImm, bool Scalar)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
the opcode of an instruction a move immediate of the constant <code>Src</code> can be replaced with if the constant is replaced with <code>ModifiedImm</code>. i.e.
</SectionUser>

If the bitreverse of a constant is an inline immediate, reverse the immediate and return the bitreverse opcode.

If the bitwise negation of a constant is an inline immediate, reverse the immediate and return the bitwise not opcode.

Definition at line <a href="#l00204">204</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/sishrinkinstructions-cpp">SIShrinkInstructions.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mov t, x</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mov x, y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mov y, t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mov t, x (t is potentially dead and move eliminated)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// v&#95;swap&#95;b32 x, y</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns next valid instruction pointer if was able to create v&#95;swap&#95;b32.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This shall not be done too early not to prevent possible folding which may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove matched moves, and this should preferably be done before RA to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// release saved registers and also possibly after RA which can insert copies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// too.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is really just a generic peephole that is not a canonical shrinking,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// although requirements match the pass placement and it reduces code size too.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;SIShrinkInstructions::matchSwap(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MovT)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
